sn45.128-132:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yamuna nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn45.128-132:1.3: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, aciravati nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn45.128-132:1.5: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, sarabhu nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn45.128-132:1.7: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahi nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn45.128-132:1.9: seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ya kacima mahanadiyo, seyyathidam—
sn45.128-132:1.10: ganga, yamuna, aciravati, sarabhu, mahi, sabba ta pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn45.128-132:1.11: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn45.128-132:1.12: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn45.128-132:1.13: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti nibbananinnam nibbanaponam nibbanapabbharam …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti nibbananinnam nibbanaponam nibbanapabbharam.
sn45.128-132:1.14: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
